title: Men Will Be Men Ad - Thoughts?
selftext:
https://open.substack.com/pub/womanifesto/p/men-will-be-men

My take on this iconic yet problematic ad series. Supporting or opposing POVs welcome.
comments:
This kind of adds are a weapon to fake feminists who go on ranting men are trash and this will be useful for them to tarnish us ,as we want nothing but peace.

dear fake feminists please leave us, we want peace, due to you people my dead ass is feared to give a compliment to ladies who look gorgeous in saree.
This is wrong on so many levels but I won't deny that it did make me laugh.
There is nothing in those ads thats objectionable. They are in good taste and grounded to reality.
